items.longDescription:
This design features the 5 characters from the 104th training corps who inherit the Titans power. Eren as "Attack Titan", Annie as “Female Titan”, Reiner as” Armored Titan”, Bertolt as”Colossus Titan” and Ymir as “Jaw Titan” Also, this design is inspired by the story which each characters have different thoughts and they fight with their own thoughts.

Attack on Titan

The popular manga series written and illustrated by Hajime Isayama was serialized in “Bessatsu Shonen Magazine” from 2009 to 2021, the cumulative circulation has exceeded 110 million copies worldwide, and it continues to create shock waves not only in Japan but also around the world. These UT are inspired by this manga which captures the reader’s attention with a world where humanity is forced to live in cities surrounded by enormous “walls” that protect them from gigantic man-eating humanoids referred to as Titans, and “Vertical maneuvering equipment” developed to combat the Titan.

©Hajime Isayama/KODANSHA Ltd.
items.name: Attack on Titan UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: The MANGA “Attack on Titan” Humanity vs. Titans. A superb collection befitting the conclusion of this turbulent story.

items.longDescription:
- Warm premium down with a fill power of 750*. *Measured by the IDFB method
- Specially constructed without down packing for an ultra light weight.
- Made with soft, lightweight, nylon taffeta fabric with a matte look.
- Anti-static lining.
- Water-repellent finish. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
- Convenient pocketable design.
- Casual, comfortable silhouette and wide quilt stitching.
- The tape on the inside of the cuffs is brushed for a soft feel.
- Front fastener designed for extra warmth. *An extra layer of fabric concealed behind the fastener helps block out the cold.
- 3D cut allows easy arm movement.
- The storage pouch fastens with a buckle so it attaches and detaches with a single touch.

items.longDescription:
- Lightweight, soft, and non-itchy fabric with a cozy feel.
- Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders.
- Slips on easily for a relaxed look.
- Shirt jacket with a curved hem and stand collar.
- One patch pocket and one inside pocket on the left chest, and 2 side seam pockets for a simple look with plenty of storage capacity.
- Checked pattern adds a style accent.
- We support the reduction of waste and of oil consumption. Clothing made using recycled polyester is part of this effort.
Ratios of recycled polyester vary by item. Please check “Materials” for details.

items.longDescription:
- Made from soft and lightweight nylon with a matte finish.
- Durable water-repellent finish. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
- Anti-static lining.
- Premium down with a fill power of over 750.
- Pocketable design.
- Now features wider quilting and a relaxed fit for more casual styling.
- We’ve added a strip behind the front zipper to keep cold air out.
- The storage pouch now fastens with a buckle so it can be attached and detached with a single touch.
- The 3D cut ensures a full range of motion through the shoulders, while the split raglan design gives it a sleek look in the front.
- The tape on the inside of the cuffs is brushed for a soft feel.
- Perfect for wearing as a middle or outer layer.

items.composition: Face: 100% Polyamide/ Filling: Body: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Hood Edge: Outer Layer: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Hood Edge: Inner Layer: 100% Polyester/ Back: 100% Polyamide/ Pocket Lining: 100% Polyester
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- The glossy nylon ripstop fabric has been upgraded to 10 denier nylon for a lighter weight and more comfortable feel.
- Anti-static lining.
- Durable water-repellent coating for light rain. *A water-repellent coating is applied to the surface of the fabric for a longer-lasting water-repellent effect.THE FINISH IS NOT PERMANENT.
-750+ Fill Power* high quality down. *by IDFB Measurement method
-No down pack for Ultra Light Weight.
-Pocketable design. Including its own carrying bag.
- Updated 3D cut ensures full range of motion through the shoulders.
- We’ve added a strip behind the front zipper to keep cold air out.
- The storage pouch now fastens with a buckle so it attaches and detaches with a single touch.
- The tape on the cuffs is brushed on the inside for a soft touch.
- A sleek, sporty fit around the waist with a more roomy fit around the shoulders and chest.
- Quilt stitching width decreases from top to bottom, resulting in a sleek visual effect.
- Unique design ensures the hood covers the whole head, while the collar stands up neatly without touching the chin.
- An incredibly lightweight and warm down layer for everyday styling.
- Suitable for sports or casual styling.
items.name: Ultra Light Down Parka (3D Cut)
items.shortDescription: Suitable for sports or casual wear, with a sleek look and a 3D cut for easy movement.  Extra size available!
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not Dry Clean

items.composition: Shell: 100% Polyester/ Filling: Body: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Hood Edge: 100% Polyester/ Lining: 100% Polyester/ Cuff: 93% Polyester, 7% Elastane/ Pocket Lining: 100% Polyester
items.designDetail: Regarding #27, there is a difference in the color of the body and the color of the fastener, but there is no problem with the quality.
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- The matte fabric is suitable for sporty or casual styling.
- Warm premium down with a fill power of 750*. *Measured by the IDFB method
- Water-repellent finish. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
- Lightweight.
- Windproof technology.
- Seamless design* keeps cold air out to keep you warm. *Except at the sides, sleeve undersides, shoulders, and hood.
- Split raglan sleeves (set-in at front, 3D cut at the back) give a streamlined look from the front, ensuring ease of movement and a sleek look.
- 3D cut around the shoulder allows easy arm movement.
- Adjusters inside the hood to adjust the fit.
- Seamless ribbed cuffs provide an improved fit and keep cold air out.
- Fleece-lined waist pockets.
- Waterproof fasteners on the waist pockets and front.
- Cushioned collar inside the hood for warmth around the neck.
- The hood keeps its shape even when worn with the front fastener undone.
*The specifications and texture of the fabric inside the waist pocket may vary from products. There are no quality problems.
items.name: Seamless Down Parka (3D Cut)
items.shortDescription: Updated hood with improved protection from the cold. Functionality and style in equal measure.
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

items.composition:
[459622]Shell: 82% Polyester, 18% Cotton/ Filling: Front Body: Back Body: From The Waist Up: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Mesh: Back Body: From The Waist Down: Sides of The Item: Sleeve: Hood: 70% Polyester, 30% Viscose/ Hood Edge: 100% Polyester/ Lining: 100% Polyester/ Pocket Lining: 100% Polyester
[449723]Shell: 55% Elastomultiester, 45% Polyester/ Filling: Front Body: Back Body: From The Waist Up: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Mesh: Back Body: From The Waist Down: Sides of The Item: Sleeve: Hood: 70% Polyester, 30% Viscose/ Lining: 100% Polyester/ Pocket Lining: 100% Polyester
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- Hybrid down outerwear developed in collaboration with professional snowboarder, Ayumu Hirano.
- A combination of lightweight high-performance cotton padding with Heat of Absorption technology, and premium down with a fill power of 750* or more. *Measured by the IDFB method
- High-performance padding around the arms and hem creates a sleek silhouette and maintains warmth.
- Crisp outer fabric.
- Water-repellent finish. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
- Collar stands up neatly without the hood up.
- Practical design with outer chest and waist pockets, handwarmers, and inner chest and waist pockets for plenty of storage.
- Non-quilted design on the outside for a sleek look.
- Streamlined design around the arms allows easy movement.
- Breathable mesh and ventilation holes keep you comfortable.
- Cuffs with hook-and-loop fastener allow easy adjustment.
- Suitable for everyday or outdoor wear.
items.name: Hybrid Down Parka
items.shortDescription: A precise combination of high-performance padding and premium down. Jointly developed with professional snowboarder Ayumu Hirano.
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- The unmistakable feel of 100% cashmere.
- High knitting tension produces a more luxurious texture. Hand-washable with anti-pilling processing.
- The body, shoulder, and sleeve widths have been adjusted to suit the thicker knit fabric.
- Collar pairs well with shirts and T-shirts.
- A versatile sweater with a natural glossy sheen and moderate drape.
items.name: Cashmere Crew Neck Long Sleeve Sweater
items.shortDescription: The unmistakable feel of 100% cashmere. Now with an even more luxurious texture.
